subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sporting Kansas City’s Kei Kamara scored on a header in the opening minutes, then gave it back with an own goal moments later in a 1-1 draw with the visiting Red Bulls.
snippet: Sporting Kansas City’s Kei Kamara scored on a header in the opening minutes, then gave it back with an own goal moments later in a 1-1 draw with the visiting Red Bulls.
